title: Counselling Center
text:
A Counselling centre has been setup in place to help students cope up with their day-to-day problems, and assist students coping with depression or stress to have a better outlook at life. It is established for the following reasons:
• Get Unstuck - Counselling helps students discuss and understand their problems to help create different strategies.
• Figure out problems - Counselling can help students understand the different sides of their problems.
• Develop a more positive, hopeful outlook - To help students understand the impact tough situations have had on their feelings and develop strategies to develop a more hopeful perspective.
• Learn more about habits that lead to problems - provide a safe space to learn more about overcoming these habits by using strategies that have been shown to help others in similar situations.
• Regain a sense of control and pleasure in life - Seeking help from professional experienced helpers may help you feel you are helping yourself, by taking steps to improve your life and influence your life situation.
• Discover personal strengths - To help you learn more about yourself by helping you see and understand your strengths and learning how to use those strengths to grow in other areas.
• Succeed - Counselling can help you set goals for college and your future. It can also help you develop strategies to attain your goals.

title: Help a friend
text:
You can help a friend by getting an appointment for them in case they exhibit any of the following behaviours:
• A change in their behaviour
• Sudden irritation, fearful, suspicious or restlessness.
• A change in appetite, sleeping pattern, or signs of withdrawal.
• Not attending tests or exams.

You can reschedule an appointment in case you're not able to visit at the scheduled time. You can get more information on their website .
